name: Mutability pseudo-class
description: The pseudo-class **mutability** represents elements whose contents is user-alterable or not. `:read-only` represents the biggest part of a site: the non-alterable content. `:read-write` represents input elements which are user-alterable or with the in HTML5 newly introduced contenteditable attribute which allows the user to edit content.
example_description: In the above mentioned code all non-alterable content is going to have the font `Verdana, Arial, sans-serif` while the editable inputs or contenteditable content is going to have a different font with a dotted gray border.
